Reason One: You are warned by the Chinese Communist Party (CPC). That means whatever message you send, you have been monitored for a long time. All the data created by yourself will be stored on the server in Tecent permanently. So, give up WeChat ASAP.

Reason Two: You're hacked by the third party commission. That means WeChat can't guard you. There is no end-to-end encryption. Just give up WeChat!
